main event: A bright white object of intense brilliance was observed traveling at extreme speed over Alabama, initially viewed on radar before visual observation.
interesting points: The object was tracked by ground radar at 20,000 feet and a minimum speed of 1,200 mph., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., An Air National Guard jet pilot reportedly avoided a collision with the object while flying at 15,000 feet., Multiple reports corroborated sightings from various observers including townspeople and air traffic control., The observed object appeared to have a tail of fire and split into pieces before rejoining.
sighted object: a bright white object with a tail of fire
